short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with your customers on WhatsApp. Personalized communication, elevated results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WABlasters: Your WhatsApp Marketing Solution

Connect with customers on WhatsApp without saving numbers using WABlasters, the powerful WhatsApp marketing and automation tool.

Key Features:

1. Effortless Messaging: Send personalized messages to contacts without saving their numbers.
2. Chrome Extension Convenience: No software installation required.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Easy to learn and use.
4. Personalized Messages: Include names in your messages for a more personal touch.
5. Media Attachments: Send images, audio, and video files.
6. Contact Filtering: Filter WhatsApp numbers for targeted campaigns.
7. Contact Management: Download, export, and save contacts.
8. Direct Sales: Send links to your website or shop for seamless purchases.
9. Bulk Messaging: Upload Excel sheets to send messages to contacts in any country
10. Delivery Reports: Track message delivery and view detailed analytics.
11. Excellent Support: Get timely assistance via email or live chat.
12. Customer Delight: Enhance customer satisfaction by connecting on their preferred platform.
13. Webapp (User Web Admin)
14. Download Group Contact
15. Send Emoji 
16. Send GIF  Image

> How to Use WABlasters:
Install the WABlasters Chrome extension.
Enter numbers (with country codes) or upload an Excel sheet.
Compose your message.
Click "Send."

Experience the power of WABlasters and boost your WhatsApp marketing today!
